item.title: Developing Good Judgment and Not Judging Others
item.description:
Developing Good Judgment and Not Judging Others by Elder Gregory A. Schwitzer, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 180th Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 2010
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Gregory A. Schwitzer, Of the Seventy

item.title: Let the Clarion Trumpet Sound
item.description:
Let the Clarion Trumpet Sound by Elder Gregory A. Schwitzer, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 185th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2015
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
